Headline: #115 Pullman/115th Temporary Reroute at 115th/Michigan
ShortDescription: #115 Pullman/115th buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via 111th, State, 115th, Michigan, due to a street blockage near 115th/Michigan.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#115 Pullman/115th buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via 111th, State, 115th, Michigan, then resume normal route, due to a street blockage near 115th/Michigan.

Allow extra travel time.
